Why Monarch Educational Foundation ?

Why Monarch?

Monarch Educational Foundation builds an Interactive Communication between the Pupils and their Teachers. This helps the Pupils get prepared both Academically and also Physically for the college challenges.

Mission

Monarch Educational Foundation is one of the Best Private Primary School in the Whole of Ibadan. Our Mission are :

Understanding the core values
Contributing to the Society Positively

Vision

Our Vision are :

Build Pupils with wonderful Communication Skills
Develop Pupils with Great Social Engagement
